package.name: ExtremeProDark
package.description: Scripted from a default light theme from the ground up, fixes a lot of bugs that most other light theme's have. It also has the Linkstage overlay settings, if you are using linkstage. RESTART FREECAD FOR CORRECT LINK COLORS

preferencepack.name: ExtremeProlight
preferencepack.description: Scripted from a default light theme from the ground up, fixes a lot of bugs that most other light theme's have. It also has the Linkstage overlay settings, if you are using linkstage. RESTART FREECAD FOR CORRECT LINK COLORS
